text: @SpeakerPelosi @WHO Jan 14 WHO said - “Preliminary investigations conducted by the Chinese authorities have found no clear evidence of human-to-human transmission of the novel #coronavirus identified in #Wuhan, #China," WHO said. It relied on information from Chinese health authorities.
